appName: Odd Machines VR: Escape The Temple
displayName: Odd Machines VR: Escape The Temple
display_name: Odd Machines VR: Escape The Temple
display_long_description:
**Odd Machines** is a VR escape room puzzle game where you must solve complex mechanical puzzles, discover hidden objects, and unveil intriguing mysteries!

Dive into a world where cryptic vibes, complex mechanisms, and smooth controls from top escape room games blend to challenge your brain skills. You'll tackle unique puzzle sets on a mysterious, gripping adventure. Every machine is crafted to deliver the ultimate escape and exploration thrill.
[media]

# SOLVE UNIQUE PUZZLES
Embark on a puzzling adventure with an eclectic mix of original Victorian machinery, classic and architectural enigmas

[media]

# EXPLORE AN ANCIENT TEMPLE
Step into a mesmerizing world where every move reveals new mysteries and changes!

[media]

# COLLECT THE FRAGMENTS OF THE STONE OF SILENCE
Once you get all 8 pieces of the lost stone, you'll be transported into a mystical scene where you'll have to crack numeric puzzles to put the pieces together and finally escape the temple

[media]
